I am working my way through Tyrixian Chronicles.  I have played 3 to
4 
 of the scenarios.  Sheesh, Was the person maze hungry he/she
designed 
them?  

I am also getting familiar with the Scenario editor.  When I refer to 
'normal' trees, I mean trees that nobody can destory, you know the 
big, tall trees (not short druid-created trees).  If you can put the 
big, tall trees on the map, tell me how.
